title: Announcement, "Artists Choose Artists: Daniela Richter, Ruth Green, Lynne Avadenka, Ann  Mikolowski Exhibition,  Detroit Focus Gallery, Detroit, Michigan", 1988
title_raw: Artists Choose Artists: Daniela Richter, Ruth Green, Lynne Avadenka, Ann  Mikolowski Exhibition,  Detroit Focus Gallery, Detroit, Michigan
signed: Signature imprinted in maroon on verso upper left quadrant: DESIGN/ EDW ARD FELLA LA
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in three text blocks of maroon, each diminishing in size. First text block, beginning from upper left corner: ARTISTS CHOOSE ARTISTS: / DANIELA RICHTER/ RUTH GREEN/ LYNNE AVADENKA/ ANN MIKOLOWSKI  Second text block, across center: NOVEMBER 18-DECEMBER 22, 1988/ OPENING RECEPTION: / FRIDAY NOVEMBER 18, 6-8:30PM/ DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ 742 BEAUBIEN, 3RD FLOOR/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN 48226/[313] 962-9025  Third text block, across lower left quadrant: ARTISTS WERE SELECT ED BYTHE 1988/*89 REVIEW COM MI TT EE  :/ HA ROLD ALL E N/ MA RI ANNE LET ASI/ CLARK E E LLIS/ WEND Y MAC GAW/ URSULA MOUST ARD AS/ LYNNE RE SCH/ G ALLERY HOURS : WED NESDAY - SATURDAY NOONTO 6PM/ CLOSED THANKSGIVING WEEK END, NOVEMBE R 25 -26/ CLOS ED DE CEMBER23  TO JANUAR Y 6/ AL SO IN THEARE A:"INTO THE WOOD S"/ ANNU AL HOLIDAY EX HIBITION/ DE TROIT ARTISTS MARKET/OPENING NOVEMBER18  5-/7:30 PM 

Verso: Imprinted in maroon from top of lower left quadrant: DET ROI T FOCUS/ 743 BEAUBIE N 3 RD FLOOR/ DET ROI T MI CHIGA N 4 822 6/ ACROSS FROM  THE BRICKTOWN PEOP LE MOVERST A TION/ WIT H THE SUPPORT OF :/ THE NATIO NAL ENDOW MENT F OR THE ARTS/ THE MI CHIGA N COUN CILFOR THE ARTS/ THE DETROIT COUNCIL FOR THE ART S; from top of lower right quadrant: NONPROFIT ORG./ BULK RA TE/ U.S. POSTA GE/ PA ID/ DETROIT MI CHIGAN/ PERMIT NO.2960

*The "/" is in the text.
description:
Poster exhibition announcement designed to be mailed.  Printed in maroon ink.    

Recto: In three text blocks, each block diminishing in size, exhibition announcement including title, artists, dates, location, contact and additional information.  At right edge, lower center, abstract hand holding DETROIT FOCUS sign.  

Verso: Upper half of sheet, two columns of abstract hands in various sizes, activities, such as holding scissors, painting, pulling a wishbone.  Lower half contains sponsors, mailing information and at center, DETROIT FOCUS logo.

tombstone.epitaph: Announcement, "Artists Choose Artists: Daniela Richter, Ruth Green, Lynne Avadenka, Ann  Mikolowski Exhibition,  Detroit Focus Gallery, Detroit, Michigan", 1988. Offset lithograph on cream paper. Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-27.
